meanings.definition: Judged or decided by a jury.
meanings.sent1: The art show had a juried competition to select the winners.
meanings.sent2: The film festival only accepts juried entries for consideration.
meanings.sent3: The juried bake-off resulted in some interesting cake creations.
meanings.sent4: Her juried performance on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The juried decision was fair and unbiased.

meanings.sent1: The court case required a juried trial to reach a verdict.
meanings.sent2: The legal system often relies on juried processes for justice.
meanings.sent3: The juried selection of the jury members was meticulous.
meanings.sent4: His juried defense strategy was well-prepared and effective.
meanings.sent5: The juried system ensures a thorough examination of evidence.
